p: From the plant Flaveria bidentis (L.) Kuntze, the anticoagulant activity of its sulfated flavonoids, quercetin 3,7,3′,4′-tetrasulfate (QTS) and quercetin 3-acetyl-7,3′,4′-trisulfate (ATS) was investigated ( Guglielmone et al., 2002). Thrombin time (TT), aPTT, antithrombin III (ATIII), PT, and heparin cofactor II (HCII) activation were measured. The flavonoids exhibited HCII activation by acting as agonists with higher activation observed exhibited by QTS than ATS ( Guglielmone et al., 2002).
